title: Randomly crashing please help
body: Whenever I start a queue for a ranked solo game my computer always crashes after 30 seconds. this never happens with any normal modes like blind pick unranked if anyone has an idea why this is happening please comment below..

replies.body:
It sounds to me like your client is running into some weird hiccups when you happen to queue for ranked games. This *could* be just a coincidence since ranked/unranked/blind games are all played on the same set of servers. 

Let's double check for any weird [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just to make sure the main issue isn't coming from there. Hit me back up if you're still having those crashes, but also make sure that you test these changes in a custom game!
